attributes.action: Purchase Broadband Deals without the need/inclusion of a Telephone Landline.
attributes.additional_details: Please Sign to Eradicate this out and out example of Daylight Robbery in Rip Off Britain!
attributes.background: Most people no longer use a landline for calls etc, instead using a mobile. So why and how do Internet Providers get away with this charge, when customers express a disconnection of the landline service to save £17.00 plus s week! Mine (Virgin) says my bill will increase more with no landline!!!!!!!

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
